summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of East 80th Street from 15th Avenue Northeast to 20th Avenue Northeast, by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8908 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
